examples.sentence: Se realiza una prueba de Intradermo para detectar la tuberculosis.
examples.translation: An intradermal test is performed to detect tuberculosis.

usage_notes.explanation: Intradermo se refiere a la inyección de una sustancia en la dermis, la capa de la piel inmediatamente debajo de la epidermis.

readability_explanation.text: This term is specific to the medical field. It refers to a type of injection given within the layers of the skin.
